title: Fiddle Sweatshirt, Fiddle Gift, Fiddle Player, Fiddle Player Shirt, Fiddle Player Gift, Bluegrass, Stringed, Musician, Fiddler Sweatshirt
description:
Hello! (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･✨

FIND A SNUG-FITTING GIFT:❤️

We use ultra soft tees and sweatshirts made with the highest quality fabrics for your comfort and happiness. We print all of our shirts with the latest technology printing techniques to bring you the best color designs that last the longest.

The brand for our shirts is ultra soft Bella Canvas and our sweatshirts are Gildan.

If you want a specific brand, please send us a message right after you place the order. Otherwise, we will send you the shirt or sweatshirt according to what we have in stock.


HOW TO ORDER: 🛍️

1) Please check all the photos from the listing.

2) Please choose your style, size and color. ( It’s true to size. We suggest you choose the size that you usually wear.)

3) Black text/design will be printed on Light color shirts and White text/design will be printed on Dark color shirts (Other colors available on request.)

4) If you want to have a different customized design, send us a message. We would be happy to help you.

PRODUCTION TIME: 🎨

1-3 days (Usually 2 days)

SHIPPING TIME: 🚚

2-5 days (Usually 3 days)

PRODUCT DESCRIPTIONS: 👕👚

Bella Canvas Unisex T-shirt
Super soft cotton, excellent quality print makes.
100% Soft cotton

Gildan 18000 Sweatshirt
Medium-Heavy Fabric Blend
50% cotton and 50% polyester (Sports Colors: 40% Cotton, 60% polyester)

RUNS TRUE TO SIZE: 👔

Our Relaxed Fit Tee (Bella + Canvas style 3001) is a unisex style that runs a touch small for men, and about a half a size large for women. It's a relaxed fit and is soft and cozy.

The classic fit along with the crew neckline deliver a comfy wearing experience with a clean-cut style. Meanwhile, the double-needle stitching at the shoulder, armhole, neck, waistband, and cuff seams add top-tier durability.

CARE INSTRUCTION: 🧴🧼

Machine wash: warm (max 40C or 105F);
Non-chlorine: bleach as needed;
Tumble dry: low heat;
Iron, steam or dry: medium heat;
Do not dry clean

THANK YOU! ❤️

If you have any problems with your order please message us right away!
